title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4812.7 - Time during which license is effective
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4812.7 - Time during which license is effective

State Regulations

No license for the conduct of any game of bingo shall be
effective for a period of more than one year from the date of original
issuance. No license, after its issuance, shall be amended so as to render it
valid beyond a period of one year from the date of its original issuance. In
the case of limited period bingo, no license shall be issued authorizing the
conduct of such games on more than two occasions in any one day nor shall any
license be issued that shall be effective for a period of more than seven of 12
consecutive days in any one calendar year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4812.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
